message.original: 複数の矢を連続で放ち 敵を大きくのけぞらせる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で矢の発射数増加（３→５）</COL>
message.translation: Fire multiple arrows in quick succession. Staggers large enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases arrows fired (3→5).</COL>

message.original: 貫通力のある矢を放つ <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で貫通時のヒット間隔が短縮し 連続ヒットしやすくなる</COL>
message.translation: Fires a shot capable of piercing multiple targets. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Shortens the interval between hits, increasing the likelihood of hitting more times.</COL>

message.original: 複数の矢を同時に扇状に放つ <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で矢の発射数増加（３→５）</COL>
message.translation: Fires three arrows in a wedge pattern. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases arrows fired (3→5).</COL>

message.original: 敵のガードを崩す爆音火薬を巻いた矢を放つ 爆音に巻き込むことで周囲の敵をも怯ませる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に吹き飛ばし力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
message.translation: Fires an arrow that produces a deafening blare on impact, breaking enemy guard. Will also launch nearby enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases blow power. LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

message.original: 矢筒内のすべての矢を直上に放ち、 敵の頭上に降らせる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: Sends a wall of arrows skyward to rain down on a broad area. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

message.original: 着弾時に回転し多段攻撃を加える矢を放つ 特に状態異常矢の使用時に効果的 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: Looses a spinning arrow that delivers a barrage of hits to an area. Especially effective with status arrows. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

message.original: 装填中のすべての矢に気絶効果のある火薬を 巻きつけ強化する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
message.translation: Applies an explosive stun effect to all arrows loaded. Increases damage inflicted. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

message.original: 渾身の力で弓を引き、高威力の矢を放つ 溜め満了の瞬間に矢を放つと威力が 大幅に上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で溜め段階拡張（１→２）</COL>
message.translation: Draws the bow with all the user's might, then looses a shot straight ahead. Power greatly increases if released as maximum charge is reached. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases total charge stages (1→2).</COL>

message.original: 素早く後方に移動する 敵との間合いを素早く離す <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費減少／発動中の耐久力上昇 LV.６でモーション変化／すり抜け時間延長</COL>
message.translation: Quickly dodges backwards, creating distance between you and your enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina cost. Increases Endurance during usage. LV.6: Motion changes. Increases invulnerability time.</COL>

message.original: 火薬を巻きつけた複数の矢を、 渾身の力で空に放ち、敵の頭上に降らせる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で矢の発射数増加（３→５）</COL>
message.translation: Coat multiple arrows in gunpowder and send them skyward to rain down on a broad area. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases arrows fired (3→5).</COL>

message.original: ボタンの連打で射撃回数が増加する また、射撃回数が増えるにつれ 敵を怯ませやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃速度上昇</COL>
message.translation: Continously shoot multiple arrows as you press the button. As you shoot more arrows, it becomes easier to stagger enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases attack speed.</COL>

message.original: 絶大な威力の矢を放つ。溜め満了の瞬間に放つと 威力が大幅に上昇し、残り体力が低い敵ほど 効果が高い。<COL ff7878>戦甲へのカウンターに特化</COL> <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で溜め時間短縮</COL>
連鎖的に爆発する火薬を巻きつけた矢を 上空に放つ 射撃時にボタン長押しで起爆高度が上昇 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で爆発回数増加</COL>
message.translation: Loose an arrow wrapped with explosive powder into the sky. Detonation altitude rises the longer the button is held while firing. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill. LV.6: Increases the number of explosions.</COL>

message.original: 敵に密着し、矢筒内の矢を全て番えて渾身の力で放つ しがみつき状態からでも可能 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で溜め段階上昇（２→３） ボタン入力回数減少</COL>
message.translation: Tightly bind together all the arrows in the quiver, and unleash them with your entire body's might. Can be activated while climbing an enemy. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill. LV.6: Increases maximum charge (2→3) and reduces number of button presses needed to advance to the next level of charge.</COL>

message.original: 【ＥＸ追加効果】 発射数が増加（５→６） 連なり射ち 剛に付与した紅蓮爆矢の攻撃威力が上昇

resource.translation: EX Additional Effects: Increase the number of arrows shot (5→6). Further increase the damage and blow power when using in conjuction with Crimson Arrow.

message.original: 【ＥＸ追加効果】 構え中の移動速度が上昇 最適距離の範囲が拡張 射程距離が延長
message.translation: EX Additional Effects: Moving speed increased during bow stance. Extend the optimal shooting range. Extend the shooting range.
